titleStmt.title: Good and bad newes from Ireland good, in the recovery of the fort and towne of Kinsale from the rebels ... : bad, in the relation of a most detestable and unheard of massacre perpetrated in Vantry upon the bodies of Mr. Iohn Davenant, his wife, children, and whole family by Odonnel Mac Hiwel an arch-rebell and neighbor to the foresaid gentleman / written by I.W. to an alderman of this city. Also the contents of a letter lately sent to a noble gentleman of this kingdome and read in the honourable House of Commons.
titleStmt.author: I. W., a factor in Dublin.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
